metadata.title: CVE-2024-38637 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:greybus: lights: check return of get_channel_from_modeIf channel for the given node is not found we return null fromget_channel_from_mode. Make sure we validate the return pointerbefore using it in two of the missing places.This was originally reported in [0]:Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.[0]https://lore.kernel.org/all/20240301190425.120605-1-m.lobanov@rosalinux.ru

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
